name: Demise In {DEMO}
description:
Demise In (currently in development) is a game made by two game designers and an audio engineer. This game is only a Demo that shows the first 5 minutes of gameplay. 

We're thankful to recieve all kind of feedback and coments.

Please send your coments and feedback to our facebook page or to our email.

FB: Demise In

Email: demisein.game@gmail.com
